backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chatroom backend with message storage, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage integration, and HTTP outcalls. Includes CRUD operations for chatrooms and messages, user presence tracking, and admin functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of X post URL replacement in MessageBubble component, listing affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including App.tsx (router setup), hooks (React Query operations), components (Header, ChatArea, MessageBubble with X post handling, MessageInput, etc.), and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tags for mobile support, cache-busting directives, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router configuration for lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional Header/Footer rendering that hides both on admin pages, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting custom image upload, Giphy GIF search with debounced search and trending results, and avatar removal with initials fallback.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header (centered on md+ screens), pinned video area, scrollable message container with auto-scroll, reply preview, message filtering to hide Creator messages without media, and category tag display.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog component for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter). Handles image uploads with progress tracking, video URL validation, and Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app logo, username editing (alphanumeric validation, 15 char limit), avatar picker, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, ensuring the app remains anonymous without authentication requirements.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, pin/unpin functionality, reply support, and embedded media (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Giphy, voice messages). Handles reaction management and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area (2000 char limit), image upload, Giphy search, voice recording, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in message text. Manages upload progress and recording state.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in an iframe with an unpin button, positioned at the top of the chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider for voice messages. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that returns a debounced version of a value, delaying updates until the specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging legacy cache entries, detecting persisted empty arrays, and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal for loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flows, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle. Exports useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including fetching, searching, creating, updating, and deleting chatrooms and messages. Manages local username/userId generation and provides mutations for all backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile viewport handling, iOS input zoom prevention, and custom styling for voice message player range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function that formats numbers into compact notation with k/M/B suffixes for thousands, millions, and billions.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas, preserving orientation and only returning compressed version if smaller than original.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips/VODs/streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in sessionStorage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom page component that fetches and displays a specific chatroom, handles view count incrementing, and shows loading/error states before rendering the ChatArea component.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that displays a list of chatrooms with search and category filtering, handles chatroom creation dialog, and manages client-side filtering of fetched chatroom data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking a feature to replace X post URLs in message text with plain text 'X Post' while preserving embedded previews below messages.
